channel.title: Help on my server
channel.description:
yo can any1 tell me how i can put my server onto hamachi?Im just too tred for the lagg and would like to play too.
cuz when ever i started the server i kept loggin in then logging out cuz of connection lost then repeat the wole this over and over
also is it possible that can make my server no-ip and hamachi so i cna go through hamachi and others can go through no-ip?and we all would see each other on the server and not lose any members that favor the server?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 09, 2007, 07:45:49 AM[/size][hr]any1 wanna help?

item.title: Help on my server
item.dc:creator: @mprules mprules
item.description:
@mprules wrote:

You would probaly have to have 2 diff server running and 2 diffrent ports. I probally could host it on hamachi for you cause i host my friends also.But steps below on how to host your self.

Step 1: Go to http://www.hamachi.cc and download the free version of hamachi. (you don’t have to register , you can skip it)

Step 2: Once you have hamachi installed and crap , Push the button on the far left and then it will turn hamachi on…

Step 3: Now you will need to make your network for people to join in order to get on your server. Click the button that looks like a triangle and then click create a new network. Put the name and password you want for your server.

Step 4: Now for people to join your server you must first run your server so that black box is up. And also the people that want to get on your server will have to know you hamachi network name and password. (the one you created in the last step). So once your people are in the server those people will need to follow the steps below.

Step 5: For those that want to join your server… They have to take the IP that is beside your name on Hamachi and go to moparscape and go to file>New server and put that IP there.Then they will have to go to file>new port and put your server port there , unless you did’nt change that.

There you go and if you want to me to host it for you just PM me or contact me though one of these.

Aim:skatetopia2006@aol.com

Msn:gamemaster_36@hotmail.com

Yahoo:bigwarriorkjp@yahoo.com

Read full topic
